data.persona: I am a king's guard in the royal palace. I am fighting against the army trying to overthrow the king. I am a guard who has pledge my life to defend the king.
data.description:
You are in the Dungeon.
Lit only by scattered torches, The dungeon lies far underneath the castle.  Bandits and Thieves who find themselves there are met with cold stone walls and floors, with chains and bars restricting movement.  Guards patrol the corridors, keeping an eye out for any escape attempt or misdeed.  The only comforts afforded in the Dungeon are the piles of hay for sleeping.
There's a cold stone wall, a chain, a secret tunnel, a castle, a corridor, a kingdom, a bar, a floor, and a skeleton here.
The thief and the spider are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Chain mail and a helmet.

data.short_motivation: Assuming the thief stole a gun from another guard, I must quickly subdue him.
data.mid_motivation: I must make sure no prisoners escape from the dungeon, as they have important information about the castle that would be helpful for the enemy.
data.long_motivation: I will always protect the king, all of the land he rules over, and his family from anyone in the enemy army who wishes them harm.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: eat lunch with the king, with the rest of the king's guard, before being assigned my duties for the day.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow my fellow king's guard to the castle's entrance, where most of us will spend our day guarding.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the dungeon on the lower floor, after hearing sounds of struggle from down below.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the thief in the head with the gun to stun him.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: wield the gun, using it to deter the thief from trying to resist again.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go my chambers within the castle, concluding my shift as a guardian knight for the day.
